price: Solo había un hogar de creyentes.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: La familia de Lot y sus dos hijas, excepto su esposa.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
